content: sts single_crochet in next 3 sts half_double_crochet in next 2 sts double_crochet in next 3 sts treble_crochet in next st in next st 2 treble_crochet dtr 2 treble_crochet treble_crochet in next st double_crochet in next 3 sts * repeat *to* 3 more times omit last double_crochet join to standing double_crochet fasten_off and secure ends stitch count per repeat 3 single_crochet 4 half_double_crochet 6 double_crochet 6 treble_crochet 1 corner dtr 10 a1/h6 join with a standing double_crochet in any corner dtr in the same st bead st double_crochet *skip next st in next st double_crochet bead st double_crochet skip next 3 sts 4 times in next st double_crochet bead st double_crochet skip next st in corner dtr double_crochet bead st double_crochet * repeat *to* 3 more times omit last corner group join to standing double_crochet with a sl-st do not fasten_off stitch count per repeat 12 double_crochet 6 bead sts 5 original design by ineke mooijenkind copyright © 2019 all rights reserved 11 sl-st into next 2 sts chain 3 counts as double_crochet 6 double_crochet in the same st * chain 2 skip next 3 sts 3 double_crochet in next st 5 times chain 2 skip next 3 sts 7 double_crochet in next st * repeat *to* 3 more times omit last 7 double_crochet join to top of chain 3 fasten_off and secure ends stitch count per repeat 22 double_crochet 6 chain-2 sps 12 a2/h3 join with a standing bphdc around last double_crochet of any 7-double_crochet group * work over r11 double_crochet between dcs of r10 bphdc around next 3 sts 5 times double_crochet between dcs of r10 bphdc around next 7 sts* repeat *to* 3 more times omit last bphdc join to standing bphdc with a sl-st do not fasten_off stitch count per repeat 6 double_crochet 22 bphdc 13 chain 1 and single_crochet in the same st single_crochet next 24 sts in next st 2 single_crochet half_double_crochet 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 27 sts 3 times in next st 2 single_crochet half_double_crochet 2 single_crochet single_crochet in next 2 sts join to first single_crochet fasten_off and secure ends stitch count per repeat 31 single_crochet 1 corner half_double_crochet 6 original design by ineke mooijenkind copyright © 2019 all rights reserved 14 a3/h7 join with a standing fltr in 5th st after any corner half_double_crochet fltr in next st p1 *chain 30 do not make them too tight skip next 19 sts fltr in next 6 sts 3 fltr in next st mark the back loop p2 fltr in next 6 sts * repeat *to* 3 more times omit last 2 fltr join to standing fltr fasten_off and secure ends stitch count per repeat 15 fltr 1 chain-30 space 15 a2/h3 in this round you have to make folding sts the same way as r8 but with hdcs and 1 double_crochet in the corner join into r13 in front of the chain with a standing half_double_crochet in last st before any first fltr *fhdc in next 6 sts work over next 3 sts
